posts.post_title: FS: T207 Lowdermilk SGC 20 **Tough Red Cycle Back** SOLD
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jeff Kennedy
Very nice despite the technical grade.  That is not a pinhole in his hair and it does not break through the back.  It looks to be some kind of paper chip or nick.  Price is $3,200.00.  Email me TwirlerReulbach@sbcglobal.net if interested.
